data.name: Star-Lord (Annihilation)
data.description: A resurrected Peter Quill that uses his trusty Terran machine guns to unleash a deadly volley against his enemies.

starItems.name: Star-Lord (Annihilation)
starItems.description: A resurrected Peter Quill that uses his trusty Terran machine guns to unleash a deadly volley against his enemies.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. 

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, always revive a dead Korg ally with <color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if Nova is an ally, clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target and the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy.

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if Nova is an ally, clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> from the primary target and the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy.
 In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the highest Damage, non-primary target enemy.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack is Unavoidable.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and secondary targets

6.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to each target with <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>440%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> to each target with <color=#9055ff>Vulnerable</color>.

1.description: When this character or a <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally.
1.nextUpgrade: Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

2.description:
When this character or a <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade: While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Accuracy.

3.description:
When this character or a <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Accuracy.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

4.description:
When this character or a <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Accuracy.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to the most injured ally.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> or <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Accuracy.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus for self and all <color=#fff568>KNOWHERE</color> allies.
